title.rendered: 3 Steps to Manage your Social Media Marketing In-house

content.rendered:
Social Media Marketing

Social Media Marketing is an easy and effective way to promote your business.
Remember social media marketing is not a onetime task. It’s a continuous process.
Social Media Marketing started with brand creation and awareness a few years ago. Now it’s mature enough to generate leads, conversions and lot more for different businesses.
Some of the key social media marketing tools include Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, etc.

Select the best suitable Platforms

  • Initially keep your focus on the most relevant platforms
  • Check which platform will help your business faster
  • Stat with chunks then create a big plan for all platforms

1. Know Your customer’s need:

  • You are the best judge for your customer. You know what your customer/ prospect wants.
  • For some business, customers look purely for service, while for some it’s the price which is a game-changer.
  • Make a note of your customer’s needs. You can categorize them as well to campaign better.

2. Content is crucial:

  • Once you have your customers categorized and have identified the need. The next important step is getting content ready.
  • Content is king. You can write your content, search for it or ask your staff to prepare it.
  • Let your content stand out when compared to competitors
  • Prepare different types of content.g. Image, text, video, infographics, etc.

3. Technology:

  • This is the final and key step. A lot of people fail here or fear here.
  • Technology is changing every other day.
  • Keeping the primary focus on business, it becomes difficult to cope up with technology. Hence it is inevitable to have a consultant to help you.
  • Consultants are cost-effective and can help you in the long run to strategize your social media/ digital media marketing.
  • After all, you should keep track of what results you are getting with top insights tools.
  • Tacking & analyzing results gives you future marketing plans blueprint.
